title: Poison Spray
content:
Poison Spray Conjuration Cantrip 1~12 Damage 1d12 Poison Project a puff of noxious gas. 3m CON Save Action

Conjuration Cantrip

Project a puff of noxious gas.

Poison Spray is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Poison Spray is a Cantrip from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Poison Spray Information

Description: Project a puff of noxious gas. Level: Cantrip School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 3m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: Constitution

How to Acquire Poison Spray

Poison Spray can be acquired by the following classes: Druid, Eldritch Knight, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Arcane Trickster

Druid, Eldritch Knight, Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Arcane Trickster

Poison Spray Tips & Notes

The spell's damage increases by 1d12 when you reach 5th level (2d12) and 10th level (3d12).
